metadata.title: CVE-2023-0668

platform: Open Enterprise Server 23.4

metadata.description: Due to failure in validating the length provided by an attacker-crafted IEEE-C37.118 packet, Wireshark version 4.0.5 and prior, by default, is susceptible to a heap-based buffer overflow, and possibly code execution in the context of the process running Wireshark.
